data.title: Quarantine For Hams

data.text:
How you can help fight COVID-19 with Dr. Scott Wright K0MD

How to watch Ham Nation live with George

A station in the United Nations building

We invite you to read, add to, and amend our show notes at wiki.twit.tv.

Submit your own video to Ham Nation at HamNationVideos@twit.tv

Thanks to Joe Walsh who wrote and plays the Ham Nation theme.

Check out Ham Nation on Facebook and Twitter!
